issue.title: [CF 742] Sounds not playing?
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.   Wipe profile/use existing one
2.  Create icon with a sound as 'On Cooldown' type
3.   Attach Sound event to icon

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

  Use ability with cooldown (Mind Blast) and when cooldown is up, expect selected sound to play

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

  Tested with v6.1.1 and r691

Do you have an error log of what happened?

  N/a

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

  Below is a simple setup showing the issue:

^1^T^STextLayouts^T ^Sicon1^T ^N1^T ^t^N2^T ^t^t^t^SGroups^T ^N1^T ^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SName^S8092 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSound ^SSound^STMW~`-~`Ding~`7 ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SUnAlpha^N0.24 ^SEnabled^B ^t^t^t^t^SVersion^N61103 ^t^N61103^S~`~| ^Sprofile^SThula~`-~`Kul~`Tiras ^^

  Super sorry if this is something obvious I am missing but it is driving me insane!  Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user RepaIsCoolerThanYou | Imported from CurseForge issue #742 | Raw

comments.body:
You have the icon set to always show (Both the Show States and Opacity settings are enabled), so the On Show event will never happen. Change the event to On Finish (right click the event handler on the list to change it).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
